QuestData.Title: Claim the Sky
QuestData.Description:
I mourn the loss of my sisters and desire nothing more than to avenge them. Yet I know that I am no match for the witch's magics or her army of Mawsworn.
We must let wisdom guide us and fly from here.
Though I am weak from my captivity, I have the strength to bear you from this place.
Let us go, friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Danica to Odyn's halls in Skyhold.
